data.title: Quicksand -reverse-, Naomi -reverse-, Mikkagetsu to Neko, Joudan janai yo, Musical Touken Ranbu (Hachi) Ranbu Yagai-sai Special Screen Version, Japanese Film Trailers
data.meta_description: Quicksand -reverse-, Naomi -reverse-, Mikkagetsu to Neko, Joudan janai yo, Musical Touken Ranbu (Hachi) Ranbu Yagai-sai Special Screen Version Japanese Film Trailers
data.text:
Welcome to the second trailer post of the week.

You can find the first part here and the others follow over the next two days.

It is a busy week for films but during the day I have been at work and practicing Japanese with My Japanese Coach on the Nintendo DS and Naoko Chino’s handbook – Japanese Verbs at a Glance.

What is the next batch of films getting a release?

Quicksand -reverse-

卍 リバース 「Manji Riba-su」

Release Date: May 24th, 2024

Duration: 99 mins.

Director: Tadaaki Horai

Writer: Tadaaki Horai, Shoko Fujimura, (Screenplay), Junichiro Tanizaki (Original Novel),

Starring: Shion Suzuki, Wataru Monma, Erina Nakazaki, Shuri Tanaka

Website Twitter: @BungoNtr JFDB

Jun’ichiro Tanizaki’s novel “Manji” has been adapted for him before – Yasuz Masumura’s version is utterly absorbing – and it gets adapted again, set in the present day and with the genders of the characters swapped.

Synopsis: Sonoda, unable to give up his dream of becoming an artist, quits his job as a salaryman and begins attending an art school with the support of his wife Yayoi, a lawyer. While at school, Sonoda begins to become interested in a handsome young man named Hikari and invites him to his home to act as a model for his sketches. An illicit sexual affair takes place and this affects Sonoda’s relationship with Yayoi but then he discovers that Hikari has a fiancée…

Naomi -reverse-

痴人の愛 リバース 「Chijin no Ai Ribasu-su」

Release Date: May 24th, 2024

Duration: 90 mins.

Director: Tadaaki Horai

Writer: Tadaaki Horai (Screenplay), Junichiro Tanizaki (Original Novel),

Starring: Yuki Masuda, Yuta Hayashi, Airi Aoki, Sakura,

Website Twitter: @BungoNtr

A adaptation of the novelist Jun’ichiro Tanizaki’s “Chijin no Ai” sets the story in modern times and reverses the genders of the two main characters.

Synopsis: A teacher named Naomi meets a younger man named Yuzuru sitting by the side of the road and feels sorry for him because he resembles an abandoned cat. She takes him in and begins to “raise” him out of pity and with little expectation of a physical relationship but she soon begins to fall for his seductive and wild charms and a masochistic relationship ensues…

Mikkagetsu to Neko

三日月とネコ 「Mikkagetsu to Neko」

Release Date: May 24th, 2024

Duration: 112 mins.

Director: Naho Kamimura

Writer: Naho Kamimura (Screenplay), Ami Uozumi (Original Comic),

Starring: Yumi Adachi, Kana Kurashina, Keisuke Watanabe, Takashi Yamanaka, Ruka Ishikawa, Nanami Hidaka,

Website Twitter: @mikazuki_movie

This was directed by Naho Kamimura, writer of Ichiko, a thriller that was screened at last year’s Tokyo International Film Festival.

Synopsis: Three people who met after the Kumamoto earthquake, live together as neither family or lover. They are different in circumstances but united by their love for a cat named Mikazuki. When one of them meets a romantic partner, their lives and routines change.

Joudan janai yo

冗談じゃないよ 「Joudan janai yo」

Release Date: May 24th, 2024

Duration: 89 mins.

Director: Tamami Kusaka

Writer: Tamami Kusaka (Screenplay), Ami Uozumi (Original Novel),

Starring: Nanami Ebisawa, Masaki Ota, Nagi, Miho Ohashi, Yusuke Takahashi,

Website Twitter: @jodan_film

This film was produced by lead actor Nanami Ebisawa in the run-up to turning 30 in an effort to give himself a leading man role and uses some of his own experiences in his life and career.

Synopsis: Takeshi is about to turn 30 but despite his passion and commitment, he has struggled to get acting jobs. While chasing his dream, he earns money by working part-time and hanging out with his friends. His career frustrations grow with time and he risks alienating people he is close to because of this…

Musical Touken Ranbu (Hachi) Ranbu Yagai-sai Special Screen Version

ミュージカル「刀剣乱舞」（八）乱舞野外祭 特別スクリーン版 「Myu-jikaru “Touken Ranbu” (Hachi) Ranbu yagai-sai Toukubetsu Sukuri-n Ban」

Release Date: May 24th, 2024

Duration: 191 mins.

Director: Isamu Kayano

Writer: N/A

Starring: Shunya Ohira, Yuuki Torigoe, Shogo Sakamoto, Kensuke Takahashi, Ryugi Yokota,

Website
